bug.author: PatrickBue
bug.summary: Update parameter sweeper to run head epochs, unfreeze, and body epochs
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Parameter sweeper can be used to find good parameters. However, parameter sweeper does not support training of head, then unfreeze, then further training of full DNN. Need to be consistent with 03 notebook.

comments.comment: Was already implemented and is default option. Uses a quarter of the epochs to train the head.
